text: This list shows a list of Belarusian rulers and communist-leaders and presidents since 945. == Rurik dynasty and Vseslavichi dynasty == *ROGVOLOD (945-978) of SCANDINAVIAN ORIGIN *VLADIMIR (978-987) *IZIASLAV I (987-1001) *VSESLAV (1001-03) died in childhood at age about 13 *BRIACHESLAV I (1003-1044) *VSESLAV II (1044-1101) longest ruling *MSTISLAV (1069) *SVIATOPOLK I (1069-1071) *GLEB (1101-1119) *ROGVOLOD BORIS (1101-1128) *VLADIMIR II MONOMAKH (1128-1125) *MSTISLAV II the great (1125-1129) *IZIASLAV II (1129-1132) died in 1154 *YAROPOLK (1132-1139) *VASILKO I (1139-1154) *ROSTISLAV GLEBOVICH (1154-1165) *VOLODAR (1165-1180) *VLADIMIR II (1186-1215) *TAUTVILAS (1250-1264) *GERDINE (1264-1267) *Part of Lithuania (1267-1917) == King of Belarus-Lithuania (1918-1918) == *MINDAUGAS (1917-1918) == Soviet Byelorussia == *JAZEP LOSIK (1918) *VILHELM KNORIN (1920-1922) and (1927-1928) *WACLAW BOGUCKI (1922-1924) *ALEXANDER OSATKIN VLADIMIRSKY (1924) *ALEXANDER KRINITSKY (1924-1925) *NIKOLAI GOLODED (1925-1927) *J.Y. GAMARNIK (1927-1930) *KONSTANTIN GEY (1930-1932) *NIKOLAI GIKALO (1932-1937) *VASILY SHARANGOVICH (1937) *E.Y. YAKOVLEV (1937) *ALEXEI VOLKOV (1937-1938) *PANTELEIMON PONOMARENKO (1938-1947) *HINRICH LOHSE (1941-1944) *ERICH KOCH (1944-1945) died 1986 *NIKOLAY GUSAROV (1947-1950) *NIKOLAY PATOLICHEV (1950-1956) *KIRILL MAZUROV (1956-1965) *PYOTR MASHEROV (1965-1980) *TIKHON KISELYOV (1980-1983) *NIKOLAY SLYUNKOV (1983-1987) *YEFREM SOKOLOV (1987-1990) == Presidents of Belarus == *Stanislav Shushkevich (1991-1994) *Myecheslaw Hryb (1994) *Alexander Lukashenko (1994-) rulers Belarus
title: List of rulers of Belarus
